main event: A bright light moved across the sky to the northwest, observed for 10 seconds.
interesting points: The object was the size of a quarter., It moved through 1/5th of the sky in 5-7 seconds., Observations indicate it could have been a meteor., The letter mentions that multiple witnesses observed the object., The object suddenly increased in speed and disappeared from view.
witness description: the sighting was reported in a letter, but specific witnesses were not named
